name: smartercleanup-django-client
description: Standalone Shareabouts client and server package
author: SmarterCleanup

scripts.start: npm run build-scss && npm run watch-scss & npm run watch-js & ./src/manage.py runserver
scripts.build-css: cat src/base/static/dist/cat-bundle.css | tee src/base/static/dist/bundle.css | gzip > src/base/static/dist/bundle.css.gz
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build-scss-production && npm run build-concat && npm run build-js-production && npm run build-css
